title: Ekushey Book Fair
description: The Ekushey Book Fair, also known as Amar Ekushey Boi Mela, is an iconic celebration of Bengali literature. It pays tribute to the Language Movement martyrs.

title: Pohela Boishakh Parade
description: Pohela Boishakh marks the Bengali New Year, celebrated with colorful parades, traditional music, dance, and delicious food. It symbolizes unity and cultural heritage.

title: Diwali Festival
description: Diwali, the Festival of Lights, is a Hindu celebration that includes lighting oil lamps, fireworks, and sharing sweets. It promotes the triumph of light over darkness.

title: Carnival of Venice
description: The Carnival of Venice is famous for its elaborate masks, costumes, and masquerade balls. It's a celebration of Italian culture and history.

title: Chinese New Year
description: Chinese New Year, also known as the Spring Festival, features dragon dances, lanterns, and delicious Chinese cuisine. It symbolizes renewal and good fortune.

title: Carnaval do Rio de Janeiro
description: The Rio Carnival is the world's largest carnival, known for its samba parades, vibrant costumes, and energetic music. It's a celebration of Brazilian culture.

title: Mardi Gras
description: Mardi Gras in New Orleans is a lively celebration with colorful parades, jazz music, and delicious Creole cuisine. It's a unique cultural experience.

title: Oktoberfest
description: Oktoberfest is the world's largest beer festival, featuring traditional Bavarian music, food, and, of course, beer. It's a celebration of German culture.

title: Cinco de Mayo
description: Cinco de Mayo commemorates the Mexican victory over French forces. It's celebrated with parades, music, dance, and Mexican cuisine.

title: Songkran Festival
description: Songkran is the Thai New Year's celebration, known for its water fights and traditional ceremonies. It symbolizes purification and renewal.
